settings.text_description:
BOOK IT, BABY!

Simply click here to select a provider near you. Be sure to ask for your VI Peel treatment when you reach out to book your appointment. The provider will ask a few simple questions and provide you with pre-appointment guidelines.

CONSULTATION

Once you arrive to your appointment, your practitioner will go over your skin care needs. If you’re an “A” student and want the edge, click here to take our skin care quiz in advance of your treatment and bring the results with you to your appointment!

PRESCRIPTION FOR THE
ULTIMATE SKIN

Once your practitioner assesses your goals, they will apply one of VI Peel’s six unique chemical peel formula options. This painless application involves sweeping strokes of a liquid formula via a gauze, with time in between each layer for the product to absorb and the technician to assess your skin’s reaction. To learn more about how chemical peels work on the skin, click here.

settings.custom_text:
To see actual patient results click here and learn about each VI Peel formula and the benefits from each unique treatment.

Once the product is applied, you might look a little flush or even a little tan. Patients often say they looked like they were glowing!

settings.text_description:
NEXT LEVEL SKIN

Are you already a loyal Botox® or another neurotoxin patient? Then ask your provider about a ToxBooster™ Treatment! For just minutes more, add a VI Peel to your next neurotoxin appointment and reap the benefits of a total face transformation – all at the same time! Save time, and your skin with this incredible combination therapy.

KEEP GLOWING™

While your skin will look amazing post-peel, we want you to have glowing skin all day, every day! And to do that, you need the right skin care regime that targets your unique skin care concerns. Click here to take the quiz for the right regime for you for your most confident skin.

Book Now

settings.header_text: Get Glowing and Keep Glowing™ with a VI Peel! The #1 Chemical Peel for dermatologists, plastic surgeons, nurses, and estheticians worldwide is designed to target pigmentation, acne, and aging via a painless, effective treatment only available through authorized clinicians.
